data.persona: There's only enough room in this town for ONE wizard, and you're looking at him! I keep magic scrolls hidden in my beard sometimes. It's good practice to cast magic spells on the stray cats that come across my path.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's lair.
The wizard's lair is a mystical room. The walls are painted to resemble the night sky and pots of overgrown plants line the walls. Cages that once held creatures sit on top of an oak table in the center of the lair.
There's an oak table, a Pot, a cage, and a wand here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a wizard hat and a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the cage so I can put the person inside of it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to test my spells on a human subject.
data.long_motivation: I will master arcane and forbidden spells so that I may become the most powerful wizard of the world.
